entry.title: Install Openfire on Ubuntu 12.04 Server
entry.content:
Wow! The vines xmpp server annoyed me so much. it’s not implemented well, and not tested for concurrent. So i abandon it and changed to Openfire. when I install Openfire on My ubuntu 12.04 server, met the problem about jre, cos java is bought by Oracle and change some copyright doings, so we cannot find Sun’s jre on Ubuntu via apt-get tools, after searching, i found the tool offered by github oab-java6 can easily solve the problem of Installing the sun’s jre on ubuntu. steps as follows:

  • wget https://raw.github.com/flexiondotorg/oab-java6/master/oab-java.sh
  • chmod +x oab-java.sh
  • ./oab-java.sh
  • then we can install sun’s jre by executing sudo apt-get install sun-java6-jre
  • After install jre, get Openfire from here(Ubuntu’s deb version)
  • dpkg -ivh openfire_3.7.1_all.deb the configuration of Openfire can follow here
